title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2210.3 - Registration requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2210.3 - Registration requirements

State Regulations

Within 90 days after any such housing accommodation shall
become subject to these regulations, the landlord thereof shall file a
registration statement, on the form provided therefor, containing such
information as the administrator may require pursuant to Part 2203 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2210.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
